channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat, Inc. -- cygwin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat, Inc. -- cygwin

item.title: CVE-2017-7523|2024-08-05T16:04:11.820Z -- red%20hat%2C%20inc. -- cygwin
item.description: Cygwin versions 1.7.2 up to and including 1.8.0 are vulnerable to buffer overflow vulnerability in wcsxfrm/wcsxfrm_l functions resulting into denial-of-service by crashing the process or potential hijack of the process running with administrative privileges triggered by specially crafted input string.
